charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for 78 months. The Ct recommends to the BOP that dft serve his sen at Devens, Massachussetts. Due to dft's physical impairment, it is highly recommended that dft be afforded all available medical assistance for his paraplegic condit ion. In addition, dft be allowed to take his wheelchair to Devens, Mass. SRT of 3 yrs, under ther terms and conditions as herein stated. SMA of $100.00.

Imprisonment for 60 months. The Court recommends to the BOP that dft be given the opportunity o participate in a drug rehabilitation program. That, if eligible for the shock incarceration program that he be allowed to participate, and that the instit ution designated to serve this sentence be Eglin AFB in FL. SRT of 5 yrs, w/terms and conditions as herein stated. SMA of $100.00.
Impris for 60 months. SRT of 5 years with terms and conditions stated herein. SMA $100.

Imprisonment for 60 months. The Ct recommends to the BOP that dft be given the opp. to participate in a drug rehabilitation program and in whatever educational and skill development programs are available in the system. Further recommends that an ins titution in the State of FLorida, near Miami, be designated for the dft to serve his imprisonment term. SRT of 4 yrs under the terms and conds as herein stated. SMA of $100.00. SECOND REVOCATION Imprisonment for a term of 9 months and 3 years of SRT. THIRD JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION: IMPR for 24 months to be served consecutively with the sentence imposed in Cr. Case 10-251-009 (JAF)

judges.judge_name: US Magistrate Judge Camille L. Velez-Rive

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for 60 months. The Ct recommends to the BOP that dft be given the opp. to participate in a drug rehabilitation program and in whatever educational and skill dev. programs are available in the system. Further recommends that an institutio n in the State of Florida, Coleman, be designated for the dft to serve his imprisonment term. It is also recommended, if eligible, he be given the opp. to participate in the Boot Camp Program. SRT of 5 yrs, under the terms and conds. as herein stated . SMA of $100.00.

Imprisonment for 37 months. The Ct recommends to the BOP that dft be permitted to participate in a drug rehabilitation program and in the Shock Incarceration Program (commonly known as the "boot camp") immediately and that dft be allowed to serve the remainder of his sentence at Guaynabo Met Dtn Ctr. SRT of 5 yrs under the terms and conds as herein stated. SMA of $100.00.
Impr for 5 months. No further term of supervision will be imposed.
